build_foundation.step_contents:
1 Understand what hacking is
2 Understand the ethics of hacking.
3 Learn how to use the internet and HTML.
4 Learn how to program.
5 Get an open-sourced Unix-based system and learn to use it.

digital_system: Broadly speaking, hacking refers to a variety of techniques that are used to compromise or gain access to a digital system.
computer: This can be a computer, mobile phone or tablet, or an entire network.
mobile_phone: This can be a computer, mobile phone or tablet, or an entire network.
tablet: This can be a computer, mobile phone or tablet, or an entire network.
network: This can be a computer, mobile phone or tablet, or an entire network.
player: In truth, a hacker is simply someone who has a vast understanding of computer systems and networks.
concept: Focus on similar concepts in all programming languages.
skill: If you choose to use your hacking skills for such purposes, be aware that there are other hackers out there who use their skills for good (they are called white hat hackers).
You can use your skills as a hacker to find solutions to problems, or you can use your skills to create problems and engage in illegal activity.
To hack, you must need a system to practice your great hacking skills.
all_information: The following is some information you want to gather:
permission: You can either attack your network, ask for written permission, or set up your laboratory with virtual machines.
ping_succeed: While you can use the ping utility (which is included in most operating systems) to see if the target is active, you cannot always trust the results — it relies on the ICMP protocol, which can be easily shut off by paranoid system administrators.
server_checked: You can also use tools to check an email to see what email server it uses.
network_scanner: You can use a network scanner to run a port scan.
tcp_udp_ports: Try other TCP and UDP ports that may have been forgotten, such as Telnet and various UDP ports left open for LAN gaming.
password: There are several methods for cracking a password.
memory_layout: If you know the memory layout of a system, you can feed it input the buffer cannot store.
malware: To create a backdoor, you need to install a piece of malware on an important system service, such as the SSH server.
track: Don't let the administrator know that the system is compromised. Don't make any changes to the website. Don't create more files than you need. Do not create any additional users.
search: You can find hacking tools by searching hacker forums.[
Not just how to use a web browser, but also how to use advanced search engine techniques.
html: You will also need to know how to create internet content using HTML. Learning HTML will also teach you some good mental habits that will help you with learning to program
py: Python and Ruby are high-level, powerful scripting languages that can be used to automate various tasks.
php: PHP is worth learning because the majority of web applications use PHP. Perl is a reasonable choice in this field as well.
bash: Bash scripting is a must. That is how to easily manipulate Unix/Linux systems. You can use Bash to write scripts, which will do most of the job for you.
assembly: Assembly language is a must-know. It is the basic language that your processor understands, and there are multiple variations of it. You can't truly exploit a program if you don't know assembly.
unix: There is a wide family of operating systems that are based on Unix, including Linux. The vast majority of web servers on the internet are Unix-based.
So you'll need to learn Unix if you want to hack the internet.
There are many different distributions of Unix and Linux.
hacking: It (along with assembly language) teaches something very important in hacking: how memory works.
To hack, you must need a system to practice your great hacking skills.
You can practice hacking these systems.[4]

know: If you are going to hack, you'll need to know how to use the internet.
You will also need to know how to create internet content using HTML. Learning HTML will also teach you some good mental habits that will help you with learning to program
learned: Learning HTML will also teach you some good mental habits that will help you with learning to program.
Learning a programming language might take time, so you need to be patient. Focus on learning to think like a programmer instead of learning individual languages.
authorized: However, make sure you have the authorization to attack your target.
collected_all_info: The following is some information you want to gather
The process of gathering information about your target is known as enumeration.
port_scanned: You can use a network scanner to run a port scan.
password_cracked: There are several methods for cracking a password.
tricked_user_password: For this technique, a hacker will contact a user and trick them into giving out their password.
user_trusted_fake_email: In this technique, a hacker sends a fake email to a user that appears to be from a person or company the user trusts. The email may contain an attachment that installs spyware or a keylogger.
people_use_unencrypted_connection: If they sign in to an account using a username and password over an unencrypted connection, the app will store that data and give the hacker access.
is_root_user: To see all the files on a computer you need super-user privileges—a user account that is given the same privileges as the "root" user in Linux and BSD operating systems.
administrator_know_compromised: Don't let the administrator know that the system is compromised.
website_unchanged: Don't make any changes to the website.
create_more_file_than_need: Don't create more files than you need.
additional_users: Do not create any additional users.
hardcoded_secret_password: If you patched a server like SSHD, make sure it has your secret password hard-coded.
know_programming: Learning a programming language might take time, so you need to be patient. Focus on learning to think like a programmer instead of learning individual languages. Focus on similar concepts in all programming languages.
know_hacking: Hacking involves a variety of specialized skills.
know_ethics: If you choose to use your hacking skills for such purposes, be aware that there are other hackers out there who use their skills for good (they are called white hat hackers)
Understand the ethics of hacking. Despite the ways hackers are depicted in popular culture, hacking is neither good nor bad.
know_unix: There is a wide family of operating systems that are based on Unix, including Linux. The vast majority of web servers on the internet are Unix-based.
So you'll need to learn Unix if you want to hack the internet.
There are many different distributions of Unix and Linux.
know_internet: If you are going to hack, you'll need to know how to use the internet.

understand: In truth, a hacker is simply someone who has a vast understanding of computer systems and networks.
learn: Learning the Skills Needed to Hack
Learn how to use the internet and HTML
enumeration: The process of gathering information about your target is known as enumeration
got_all_info: The following is some information you want to gather
ping: While you can use the ping utility (which is included in most operating systems) to see if the target is active, you cannot always trust the results — it relies on the ICMP protocol, which can be easily shut off by paranoid system administrators.
check_email_server: You can also use tools to check an email to see what email server it uses.
reached_the_remote_system: Can you reach the remote system?
run_port_scan: You can use a network scanner to run a port scan. This will show you the ports that are open on the machine, the OS, and can even tell you what type of firewall or router they are using so you can plan a course of action.
found_path_in_system: Find a path or open port in the system.
contact_and_trick_a_user: Social Engineering: For this technique, a hacker will contact a user and trick them into giving out their password.
crack_password_by_social_engineering: Social Engineering: For this technique, a hacker will contact a user and trick them into giving out their password.
send_fake_email: Phishing: In this technique, a hacker sends a fake email to a user that appears to be from a person or company the user trusts.
crack_password_by_phishing: Phishing: In this technique, a hacker sends a fake email to a user that appears to be from a person or company the user trusts.
create_fake_wifi_access: ARP Spoofing: In this technique, a hacker uses an app on his smartphone to create a fake Wi-Fi access point that anyone in a public location can sign into.
crack_password_by_arp_spoofing: ARP Spoofing: In this technique, a hacker uses an app on his smartphone to create a fake Wi-Fi access point that anyone in a public location can sign into.
crack_password_by_brute_force: Brute Force: A brute force attack simply tries to guess the user's password. This is useful for gaining access to easily-guessed passwords
gain_access_with_password: There are several methods for cracking a password. They include some of the following
create_buffer_overflow: Buffer Overflow: If you know the memory layout of a system, you can feed it input the buffer cannot store.
take_control_of_system: You can overwrite the code stored in the memory with your code and take control of the system.
install_malware: To create a backdoor, you need to install a piece of malware on an important system service, such as the SSH server.
bypass_standard_authentication_system: This will allow you to bypass the standard authentication system.
not_let_administrator_know: Don't let the administrator know that the system is compromised.
make_no_change_to_website: Don't make any changes to the website.
create_fewest_file: Don't create more files than you need.
delete_additional_users: Do not create any additional users.
hardcode_password: If you patched a server like SSHD, make sure it has your secret password hard-coded.
learn_concepts: Focus on similar concepts in all programming languages.
learn_internet: So you'll need to learn Unix if you want to hack the internet
learn_programming: Learning a programming language might take time, so you need to be patient. Focus on learning to think like a programmer instead of learning individual languages. Focus on similar concepts in all programming languages.
learn_unix: There is a wide family of operating systems that are based on Unix, including Linux. The vast majority of web servers on the internet are Unix-based.
become_skilled: Hackers are simply people who are skilled in technology who like to solve problems and overcome limitations.

hacking2.step_contents:
2 Know your target.
3 Test the target.
4 Run a scan of the ports.
5 Find a path or open port in the system.
6 Crack the password or authentication process.
7 Get super-user privileges.
8 Create a backdoor.
9 Cover your tracks.

hacking.description: the action that invade a system

go.description: Travel from one location to another
go.prerequisites: The player must be at the "from" location
go.results: The player is at the "to" location

understand.prerequisites: the player doesn't know the concept

learn.prerequisites: the player doesn't have the skill

get.prerequisites: The player must be at the same location at the item, and the item must be gettable.
get.results: The object is now in the player's inventory

machine_secured.results: The player has permission to attack a target

enumeration.prerequisites: the player doesn't have information about the target
enumeration.results: the player gathered all information needed for the target

got_all_info.description: confirm the player have all information for next step
got_all_info.results: unblock next step and continue to test the target

ping.prerequisites: the player hasn't ping yet, and has gathered information about the target

check_email_server.description: use tools to check an email to see what email server the target uses
check_email_server.prerequisites: the player hasn't checked the email server of the target
check_email_server.results: the player found out what email server the target uses

reached_the_remote_system.description: test whether the player can reach the remote system
reached_the_remote_system.prerequisites: the player has pinged successfully and found out what email server the target uses
reached_the_remote_system.results: the player reaches the remote system

run_port_scan.description: Run a scan of the ports
run_port_scan.prerequisites: the player has a scanner and hasn't run a scan

found_path_in_system.description: Find a path or open port in the system
found_path_in_system.prerequisites: the player hasn't tried to exploits TCP or UDP ports
found_path_in_system.results: the player exploits TCP or UDP ports and finds a path in the system

contact_and_trick_a_user.prerequisites: the player is trying to acquire a password
contact_and_trick_a_user.results: the player tricks users into giving out their password

crack_password_by_social_engineering.description: the player crack password by social engineering
crack_password_by_social_engineering.prerequisites: the player contact and trick user's password

send_fake_email.description: send a fake email to a user that appears to be from a person or company the user trusts
send_fake_email.prerequisites: the player is trying to acquire a password
send_fake_email.results: the user trusted the email and give out their information

crack_password_by_phishing.description: the player cracks password by phishing
crack_password_by_phishing.prerequisites: the player sends out fake email and tricked people

create_fake_wifi_access.description: a hacker uses an app on his smartphone to create a fake Wi-Fi access point that anyone in a public location can sign into.
create_fake_wifi_access.prerequisites: the player is trying to acquire a password
create_fake_wifi_access.results: people sign in to an account using a username and password over an unencrypted connection, the app will store that data and give the hacker access.

crack_password_by_arp_spoofing.description: the player cracks password by ARP spoofing
crack_password_by_arp_spoofing.prerequisites: the player create fake wifi and get user's passwords

crack_password_by_brute_force.description: the player guess the user's password
crack_password_by_brute_force.prerequisites: the player is trying to acquire a password

gain_access_with_password.description: the player use cracked password to gain access
gain_access_with_password.results: the player have access to the system and can continue to hack

create_buffer_overflow.description: create buffer overflow to take control of the system
create_buffer_overflow.prerequisites: the player know the memory layout of a system
create_buffer_overflow.results: the player overwrite the code stored in the memory with your code and take control of the system

take_control_of_system.results: the player can control the system

install_malware.description: install a piece of malware on an important system service

bypass_standard_authentication_system.description: the malware allows the player to bypass standard authentication system via backdoor
bypass_standard_authentication_system.results: the user bypass standard authentication system

not_let_administrator_know.description: Don't let the administrator know that the system is compromised
not_let_administrator_know.prerequisites: the player leaves track in the hacked system
not_let_administrator_know.results: the player cleared the track so that the administrator doesn't know that the system is compromised

make_no_change_to_website.description: Don't make any changes to the website
make_no_change_to_website.prerequisites: the player leaves track in the hacked system by changing the website
make_no_change_to_website.results: the player cleared the track so that the website is unchanges

create_fewest_file.description: Don't create more files than you need
create_fewest_file.prerequisites: the player leaves track in the hacked system
create_fewest_file.results: the player cleared the track so that no additional files are created

delete_additional_users.description: Do not create any additional users
delete_additional_users.prerequisites: the player leaves track in the hacked system by creating additional users

hardcode_password.description: the player has his secret password hard-coded
hardcode_password.prerequisites: the player hasn't had his secret password hard-coded

track_covered.prerequisites: the player haven't covered all tracks

learn_concepts.description: Learn all basic concepts about hacking
learn_concepts.prerequisites: The player must know what is hacking and the ethics of hacking
learn_concepts.results: The player now knows all basic concepts about hacking

learn_internet.prerequisites: The player must know HTML and advanced search engine skills
learn_internet.results: The player now acquired advanced internet skills

learn_programming.description: Learn all required programming languages for hacking
learn_programming.prerequisites: The player must have learned cpp, python, php, bash, and assembly language
learn_programming.results: The player now learned all required programming languages for hacking

learn_unix.prerequisites: The player must learn how to use unix
learn_unix.results: The player now learned how to use unix

become_skilled.description: Unblock pathway from rookie stage to skilled stage
become_skilled.prerequisites: The player must know basic concepts about hacking, learn advanced internet skills, how to program, and how to use unix systems
become_skilled.results: Pathway from rookie stage to skilled stage is unblocked

at.description: someone or something is present at some place

connected.description: One location is connected to another location

blocked.description: Travel from one location to another is temporarily blocked

inventory.description: A collection of items that the player has

know.description: comprehend a concept or learned a skill

tricked_user_password.description: contact a user and trick them into giving out their password

user_trusted_fake_email.description: user trusted a fake email sent by hacker

people_use_unencrypted_connection.description: people sign in to an account using a username and password over an unencrypted connection

administrator_know_compromised.description: the administrator know that the system is compromised

website_unchanged.description: make any changes to the website

create_more_file_than_need.description: create more files than you need

know_unix.description: Learned how to use unix-like operating systems

know_internet.description: Learned advanced search engine and internet skills
